entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Winchester
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow early in the evening. Snow beginning in the evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
